thread.title_full: What Every Country In The World Is #1 At - Digg

title: What Every Country In The World Is #1 At - Digg
text: Live What Every Country In The World Is #1 At EVERYBODY WANTS TO RULE THE WORLD What Every Country In The World Is #1 At Feb 22 2017, 9:58 PM digg Blacklist story Blacklist domain From the inebriated ( France, Whiskey Drinkers ) to the caffeinated ( Netherlands, Coffee Drinkers ), the free ( Canada, Personal Freedom ) to the not-so-free ( China, Jailed Journalists ), the power hungry ( Iceland, Electricity Use ) to the power mad ( Turkey, Twitter Censorship ), pretty much every country in the world is, technically, the best at something. Information Is Beautiful originally put together this graphic showing what every country is #1 at in 2010, but recently updated it with stats through 2016, because it's always good to have up to date knowledge of what every country is the best in the world at. View a zoom-able version here .
